entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12 except minus 20 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds except mainly cloudy along parts of the coast this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 12 except minus 20 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening then changing to rain showers overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the evening then to 60 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023
